syllabus:
**English III – English for Business**

Fall 2020

**INSTRUCTOR**  Ann Wan-Hsin Lee 李婉歆

**COURSE DESCRIPTION**

This course aims to prepare students to use English in business settings and to discuss selective business-related topics. Relevant terminologies and patterns will be introduced and practiced in each lesson. Students are expected to use four skills to participate in a variety of in-class activities, including the discussion and role-play. In the end of this course, students will be asked to work on a group proposal with clear and persuasive language.
